talk.chat:
Magister Minevia:
Hmmm, well, it's not that I'm lazy, you see... I simply cannot teach you magic. I am Human and I feel a little uncomfortable teaching something so sensitive to another race... And besides, you're not even a Mystic!

Magister Minevia:
Some time ago, a strange Elemental Summoner visited Anabel. It seems that she was a former paramour of the old Lord of Innadril. They had apparently been together for a century or more! You wouldn't know it to look at her, but she is as old as your grandmother's grandmother. Regardless, I still can't condone those kind of Human-Elf relationships. They're unnatural! Tell me, how would you feel knowing that your lover would stay forever young, even as you became old and gray?
Learn skills.
Ask about Skill Enchanting.
Quest

Gatekeeper Minerva:
Are you kidding? How dare you go around killing people indiscriminately! Did you think there would be no consequence of your actions? I cannot send you through the Gate of Space and Time. You must find another method of transport.
